Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Pexu has a direct effect on rukz. For those who are pexu, would it be less likely to see rukz if the individual was not pexu?

action.content:

- Probability of rukz for pexu individuals (pexu) is 18%.
